Classes in com.compendium.io.jabber used by com.compendium.io.jabber
BSAgentsListener
          BSAgentsListener is interface you can implement to get agents events notifications.
BSAuthEvent
          BSAuthEvent contains information about event during authentication process.
BSAuthListener
          BSAuthListener is interface you can implement to get authentication events notifications.
BSAuthorizationBean
          BSAuthorizationBean provides athentication handling.
BSAuthState
          BSAuthState contains information about current phase of authentication process.
BSConfBean
          BSConfBean provides conferencing handling.
BSConfListener
          BSConfListener is interface you can implement to get conference events notifications.
BSConfRoomInfo
          BSConfRoomInfo provides information about a conference room.
BSConnectionBean
          BSConnectionBean is the main bean for BuddySpaceBeans.
BSInfoQueryBean
          BSInfoQueryBean handles IQ part of jabber protocol.
BSIQListener
          BSIQListener is interface you can implement to get special iq events notifications.
BSLogger
          BSLogger class logs sent and received packets through given connection and the connection state.
BSLogListener
          Interface for logging events in jabber client.
BSMessageListener
          BSMessageListener is interface you can implement to get message events notifications.
BSMessengerBean
          BSMessengerBean provides message handling.
BSPresenceBean
          BSPresenceBean provides presence handling.
BSPresenceInfo
          BSPresenceInfo contains presence information.
BSPresenceListener
          BSPresenceListener is interface you can implement to get presence changes notifications.
BSPresencesOfJID
          BSPresencesOfJID contains presence information about all resources the given JID is logged from.
BSRegListener
          BSRegListener is interface you can implement to get registration events notifications.
BSRegState
          BSRegState contains information about current phase of registration process.
BSRosterBean
          BSRosterBean provides roster handling.
IQConfBuilder
          IQConfBuilder is the class used for building an IQConf.

          This class handles the Jabber client side connection for Meeting Replay messaging.
